CHAT.comment: FLORIDA, Petitioner v. KEVIN DEWAYNE POWELL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:15 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH W. JACQUOT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID O'NEIL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DEBORAH K. BRUECKHEIMER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH W. JACQUOT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:15 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
